org.apache.storm.streams.processors

Class ForwardingProcessorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.streams.processors.ForwardingProcessorContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ProcessorContext

    public class ForwardingProcessorContext
extends Object
implements ProcessorContext

    A context that emits the results to downstream processors which are in the same bolt.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Set<String> getWindowedParentStreams()
      Returns the windowed parent streams.
      boolean isWindowed()
      Returns true if the processing is in a windowed context and should wait for punctuation before emitting results.
